metadata.dc:title: Temporal arteritis as initial manifestation of renal cell carcinoma
metadata.dc:description: Vasculitis as paraneoplastic syndrome of renal cell carcinoma has been rarely report. We report a patient who initially was studied for temporal arteritis, and was later diagnosed of a renal cell carcinoma. The vasculitis resolves after surgery treatment of the tumour
metadata.dc:creator: Cervera Miguel, J. I
Ramírez Backhaus, M
Trassierra Villa, M
Jiménez Cruz, F
Palmero Marti, J. L
Bonillo García, M. A
metadata.dc:description: La vasculitis como síndrome paraneoplásico del carcinoma de células renales (CCR) ha sido raramente descrito. Presentamos el caso de una paciente que debutó con un cuadro Arteritis de la Temporal, diagnosticándose posteriormente de un CCR asintomático. La vasculitis resolvió tras el tratamiento quirúrgico del tumor
metadata.dc:title: Arteritis de la temporal como forma de presentación del carcinoma de células renales
